All Games

Browse every Tesla Arcade title we cover, with guides to replicate them at home.

  • 2048

    Swipe-and-merge numbers until you reach 2048 (or beyond).

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Backgammon

    Classic board game of racing and risk.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Beach Buggy Racing 2

    Kart racer with Tesla twist: steering-wheel controls inside the car! At home it’s full-featured with multiplayer.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Boomerang Fu

    Chaotic party brawler where food friends slice each other with boomerangs.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Castle Doombad Classic

    Trap-laying castle defense with Saturday-morning-cartoon vibes.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Cat Quest

    Charming top-down action RPG about a heroic cat saving Felingard.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Chess

    Time-tested strategy. Play vs AI or pass-and-play.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Cuphead

    Hand-animated boss-rush platformer. The Tesla build is a taster; the full game + DLC shine at home.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Fallout Shelter

    Vault management sim. Great in short Tesla sessions; deeper progression and cloud saves at home.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Mahjong

    Tile-matching solitaire variant (not four-player Riichi)—relaxing puzzles.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Sky Force Reloaded

    Arcade shoot-’em-up with upgrades and missions; Tesla build works well, but home versions add more progression and events.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Solitaire

    Classic Klondike-style card solitaire.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Sonic the Hedgehog (Sega Classics)

    Retro fast-paced platformer — Tesla version is pure nostalgia; at home you get collections, emulators, and extras.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Stardew Valley

    Farming-life sim with cozy vibes and surprising depth.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Sudoku

    Logic number puzzles from easy to diabolical.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • The Battle of Polytopia

    Turn-based 4X-lite—tight matches and simple inputs make it a natural fit for Tesla; more modes at home.

    Available in Tesla Arcade

  • Vampire Survivors

    Horde survival auto-attacker with builds that snowball into screen-filling chaos.

    Available in Tesla Arcade
